# Deliverable: Demo Slides & Video

Description

Prepare a 2–3 minute demo video and a short slide deck for judges summarizing the problem, approach, and impact.

Acceptance criteria

- A short slide deck (3–5 slides).
- A recorded demo video (2–3 minutes) that follows the demo script.
- Slides and video stored in `docs/`.

Estimate: 4 hours

Owner: @designer
